title: Into the forest
subTitle: Black Spur Drive, rainforests & waterfalls
desc: Embark on a picturesque journey through lush apple orchards, serene rainforests, and iconic Australian forests, all while savouring quick coffee breaks and exploring charming towns along the way. Be captivated by one of the state's tallest waterfalls, before concluding the day with a mesmerizing sunset, overlooking the majestic mountains.

activities.title: Free Cancellation
activities.description: Cancel up to 24 hours in advance for a full refund

activities.title: Duration - 11hrs
activities.description: 11 hrs

activities.title: Start & End time
activities.description: between 8/9 AM & End between 7/9 PM

activities.title: Pickup & Drop-off
activities.description: Pickup included from anywhere in Melbourne within 10km radius

activities.title: Small groups
activities.description: Private tour for your group of maximum 4 people

activities.title: Designated chauffeur
activities.description: Enjoy the convenience of having a dedicated chauffeur throughout the entire journey, ensuring a personalized and stress-free experience.

activities.title: Beverages on-board
activities.description: Stay refreshed with a selection of soft drinks, beers and ciders on the house!

activities.title: Lunch
activities.description: Your trip includes a delicious lunch with locally sourced ingredients and picturesque views

activities.title: Spotify
activities.description: Enhance your road trip experience & Set the mood with your favourite tunes using our Spotify access during the journey

activities.title: Comfort items
activities.description: Stay comfy with complimentary use of blankets, umbrellas & USB charging ports

activities.title: Free Photography
activities.description: Capture your memories effortlessly as photography is included and provided to you following the tour.

Iternities.title: Apted Orchards - Arthur’s Creek
Iternities.description: Look around the rows of apple trees and enjoy the ambience on this captivating drive

Iternities.title: Kinglake town (Songbird Cafe & Larder)
Iternities.description: A morning stop to stretch our legs as we continue travelling inland towards the beautiful rainforests. Just a quick break to buy some coffee/breakfast if needed (own expenses)

Iternities.title: Wirrawilla Rainforest walk
Iternities.description: Take in the sounds & smells of a beautiful rainforest surrounded by Myrtle Beech and Sassafras tress. One km grade two walk suitable for all ages & fitness levels

Iternities.title: Black Spur Drive
Iternities.description: Lower the windows and enjoy the fresh air as you pass through this iconic route through the lush Australian forest. Gaze up at the mountain ash trees and the green ferns as you drive through the winding roads with breathtaking views at every turn

Iternities.title: Redwood Forest
Iternities.description: Step amongst the towering Californian Redwood Forest and enjoy a majestic walk in the company of over thousand enormous red-barked trees reaching up to 55 metres high. Notice the climate getting cooler, quieter and calmer as you step through the woods.

Iternities.title: Warburton
Iternities.description: Attractive town nestled in a valley between heavily forested mountains is our lunch spot. Many of the restaurants/cafes are housed in buildings which date back to Warburton's early beginnings as a mountain escape for Melburnians in the early 1900s.

Iternities.title: Marysville
Iternities.description: Take a stroll through Marysville and surrounds, an ideal destination for lovers of nature and the outdoors. Learn about the history of this town as you stroll through the main streets and honour the fallen soldiers at the solemn memorial in Gallipoli Park.

Iternities.title: Steavenson Falls
Iternities.description: Cascading waterfall in the heart of Marysville. One of the tallest waterfalls in the state!

Iternities.title: Keppel Lookout
Iternities.description: Immerse yourself in a serene moment, gazing upon the majestic mountains as the day transitions into the enchanting golden hour or, depending on the time of year, witness a breathtaking sunset over the horizon.

cancellationPolicies: Full refund available with cancellation 24 hours before the road-trip start time
No refund for cancellations made within 24 hours of the road-trip start time
Changes requested within 24 hours of the road-trip start time will not be accommodated.
Departure and destination times align with Melbourne local time
In case the road-trip is cancelled due to severe weather conditions, you will be offered either a full refund or an alternative date to travel
meetAndPickup: Pickup included from anywhere in Melbourne within 10km radius. Enquire during your booking to confirm the Pickup location. We can also arrange pickup outside the 10km radius from Melbourne CBD at an additional service fee.
